name: The Kings Doom
description:
Hey you, Anthony!
We need you to go to the city and speak to the people. Their support is needed if we want to win this fight: for justice and freedom! You will get our message when you are there.

As always - the kings doom

This game was made for the #GodotWildJam22 with the theme Revolution.

In this game you have to try to convince the people of a small city that their live is bad and that they should do something about it.

Because not only do you interact with the NPCs, but they do so with each other, this game is diffrent each time (as well as their starting stats). I spend quite a time on the behaviours, so each NPC will need foot, and has a limited amount of money, etc...

It wasn't enough time to implement everything I thought about though. Also it can happen that you encounter strange situations. Also the balancing could have had some more time. But anyways, I hope everything works out fine.

Thanks to SockeMagneti for the wonderful art, I'm sorry that my animation skills are not as good as they could be ;). 

Thanks for playing, TreeTimes
